TextView.android:text: Fort JadhavGADH the only Heritage Luxury Fort Hotel of Maharashtra just 14 kilometers from Pune welcomes you with 300 years of Royal Maratha legacy with secret passages, dungeons, lush lawns, canons, and gun holes, escape routes, interesting stories of valour and royalty. Fort JadhavGADH in Pune is one leisure vacation you just can’t miss thrown in a scenic drive from Mumbai or Pune. The sound of royalty greets you as soon as you enter Fort JadhavGADH, as you are greeted by the Mavlas (soldiers during the period of ChhatrapatiShivajiMaharaj who play’s the tutari and a lady dressed in the traditional nauvari (9-yard sari). There is something ineffably mesmerizing about staying at Fort JadhavGADH, the only Heritage Luxury Fort Hotel in Pune Maharashtra. Fort JadhavGADH reincarnation into a Heritage Luxury Fort Hotel is unassuming and unhurried masterpiece where everything has its root ensconced in history the General Manager is called Killedar, the manager at the Reception is called Swagat Kaksha Vyavasthapak, the swimming pool in the fort hotel is called Kund, the Chhajja is the quaint all-day dining, Kholis are the rooms, Prangan, Panchayat and Gurukullfor the conference room, this truly History revisited. Perched on a hill Fort JadhavGADHwas built in 1710 by Shri. PilajiJadhavrao, a Maratha General in the army of ChattrapatiShahuMaharaj as a residence. The PilajiDarwaza, Maha Darwaza, GadhichaDarwaza, KundDarwaza, PurandarDarwaza, rock stairways, they all tell a story.
